Procrastination: Another problem writers may face is procrastination. This is when a writer delays or avoids starting their work, often due to fear or lack of motivation.
Distractions: Writers may also face distractions, such as social media, email, or phone notifications, which can make it difficult to focus on their work.
Self-Doubt: Writers may also experience self-doubt, which can lead to a lack of confidence in their writing abilities.
Writer's Burnout: Writers may also experience burnout, which is when they become physically and mentally exhausted from the demands of writing.
Inconsistency: Writers may also struggle with consistency, which can make it difficult to maintain a regular writing schedule.
